== Add user and change root password ==

Change root password
{{{
passwd
}}}

Add user:
{{{
adduser demo

visudo // add line demo    ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL
}}}

== Mosh ==

https://mosh.mit.edu/

== Install and setup apache to run at start up ==



Run at start:
{{{
update-rc.d apache2 defaults
}}}
